channel.title: I need help: collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status
channel.description: Hi dear axo patchers! I have made a large synth patch. The cpu is 50%. First it was when i used a envelope follower. After deleting other things in the patch it worked. Now I put a stomp/delay in the patch and the following error shows up: What can I do? Thanks for help.

item.title: I need help: collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status
item.dc:creator: @jaffasplaffa Mr. Grimm
item.description:
@jaffasplaffa wrote:

Axoloti only has smal amount of SRAM. I would suggest, where it is possible, to use SDRAM versions of the delays. For example this version: delay/write sdram.

Read full topic
item.source: I need help: collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status

item.title: I need help: collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status
item.dc:creator: @lis0r
item.description:
@lis0r wrote:

You need to pay attention to the first error, not the last one:

section '.rodata' will not fit in region 'SRAM'

Use less SRAM!

Read full topic
item.source: I need help: collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status

item.title: I need help: collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status
item.dc:creator: @arunarush Tom
item.description:
@arunarush wrote:

Hi dear axo patchers!

I have made a large synth patch. The cpu is 50%.

First it was when i used a envelope follower. After deleting other things in the patch it worked. Now I put a stomp/delay in the patch and the following error shows up:

image.png2038x1080 140 KB

What can I do? Thanks for help.

Read full topic
item.source: I need help: collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status
